name: X-Micro
overview:
X-Micro Technology Corp. (X-Micro) is a Taiwanese high-tech company involved in consumer electronics and digital signage.

X-Micro is based in Zhonghe District of the New Taipei City. Its other main centre is located in the Taiwanese computer technology center of Hsinchu. All its main operations are situated in either one of the centres. Major project partners of X-Micro include many large Taiwanese IT-giants, such as: ACER, MSI, MEDION, TARGA, TOPCOM, PEARL, NEW EGG and Canyon.

Its current main markets alongside Taiwan are Europe, Latin America and North America. The company has also been awarded several prizes from home consumers electronics reviewers in its main markets, including: 3DItalia(Italy), pcApex (USA), TechConnect (the Netherlands), TweakPC (Germany), etc.

The range of the consumer electronics products of X-Micro includes: digital photo frames, media extenders, digital TV-bars, smartphone docking devices and wireless modules/routers.

The digital signage products of X-Micro includes screen from 7inch up to 65inch and more. More specific products offered by us include: small screens for taxis, order boards for restaurants and digital signage kiosks.
